Module f22_hw06_comp310_f22_hw06_03
Package provided.ballworld.extVisitors

Interface IBallHostAlgo<R,P,H extends IBallHost<? super H>>

Type Parameters:
R - The type of the return value
P - The type of the input parameter values
H - The specific sub-type of the visitor's host being used.
All Superinterfaces:
IExtVisitor<R,IBallHostID,P,H>, Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
IBallAlgo<R,P>, IConfigBallAlgo
All Known Implementing Classes:
ABallHostAlgo, AConfigBallAlgo, BallAlgo, CheckSameTypeBallAlgo, CompositeConfigBallAlgo, ConfigColorBallAlgo, ConfigCriteriaBallAlgo, ConfigInteractBallAlgo, ConfigPaintBallAlgo, ConfigPhysicsBallAlgo, ConfigSameTypeBallAlgo, ConfigUpdateBallAlgo, ErrorConfigBallAlgo
public interface IBallHostAlgo<R,P,H extends IBallHost<? super H>> extends IExtVisitor<R,IBallHostID,P,H>
Type-narrowed extended visitor for balls. This interface needs further type-narrowing to be used in student code!
Author:
swong
